de.mrapp.android.dialog

Class ScrollableArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.ScrollableArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, java.io.Serializable

    public final class ScrollableArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, android.os.Parcelable
    Represents the scrollable area(s) of a dialog.
    Since:
    4.2.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static ScrollableArea create(@Nullable
                                    ScrollableArea.Area area)
        Creates and returns a new scrollable area.
        Parameters:
        area - The area, which should be set, as a value of the enum ScrollableArea.Area or null, if no area should be scrollable

      • create

        public static ScrollableArea create(@Nullable
                                    ScrollableArea.Area top,
                                    @Nullable
                                    ScrollableArea.Area bottom)
        Creates and returns a new scrollable area.
        Parameters:
        top - The top-most area, which should be scrollable, as a value of the enum ScrollableArea.Area or null, if no area should be scrollable
        bottom - The bottom-most area, which should be scrollable, as a value of the enum ScrollableArea.Area. If the top-most area is null, the bottom-most are must be null as well. The index of the bottom-most area must be at least the index of the top-most area

      • isScrollable

        public final boolean isScrollable(@NonNull
                                  ScrollableArea.Area area)
        Returns, whether a specific area is scrollable.
        Parameters:
        area - The area, which should be checked, as a value of the enum ScrollableArea.Area. The area may not be null
        Returns:
        True, if the given area is scrollable, false otherwise

      • getTopScrollableArea

        public final ScrollableArea.Area getTopScrollableArea()
        Returns the top-most scrollable area.
        Returns:
        The top-most scrollable area as a value of the enum ScrollableArea.Area or null, if no area is scrollable

      • getBottomScrollableArea

        public final ScrollableArea.Area getBottomScrollableArea()
        Returns the bottom-most scrollable area.
        Returns:
        The bottom-most scrollable area as a value of the enum ScrollableArea.Area or null, if no area is scrollable
